com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb

Class RecipientMBList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb.AbstractMBList<Recipient>
      • com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb.RecipientMBList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @SessionScoped
 @Named(value="recipientList")
public class RecipientMBList
extends AbstractMBList<Recipient>
    This class is a managed bean list. The purpose is to provide a complete list of the main entities involved in this context, in order to guarantee a minimal network traffic necessary to run the system, and also ensure that the list will be always updated.
    Since:
    1.5
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tranquilo Dognini Neto
    See Also:
    AbstractMBList, Serialized Form
